effect.Name: Linear Burn
effect.description: Linear Burn - (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Looks at the color information in each channel and darkens the base color to reflect the blend color by decreasing the brightness. Blending with white produces no change
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Linear Burn (Background) Shader | 1.1 (24.06.2024) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Looks at the color information in each channel and darkens the base color to reflect the blend color by decreasing the brightness. Blending with white produces no change

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of base visibility
